WorkItem.Description:
See http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3330073/graphviz-size-pagesize-attribute-seemingly-ignored for more details, but ...
 
QuickGraph is formatting Size and PageSize as "(width, height)" but the parentheses cause the attribute to be ignored (in GraphViz 2.26.3)
 
Also, in QuickGraph, Page and PageSize are of type Size, an integral type, but such attributes are to be interpreted as Inches, not pixels, so these properties should be at least changed to be of type SizeF.
WorkItem.Summary: Size, PageSize formatting syntax error for GraphViz DOT output
